ComicInfo.Title: Studs; Sunny Disposition; Happy Any Day
ComicInfo.Summary:
With the arrival of an eclipse, Linus prepares the gang for the worst. Using Charlie Brown’s perfectly round head as a placeholder for the sun, he must do all he can to keep them from staring into the upcoming rays. “Sunny Disposition” and more adventures are in store in this brand-new issue!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Charles M. Schulz (a) & Kara Leopard (d) | 1 | RE | "Stop Calling Me Sir" First Appearance BOOM! Studios Exclusive Cover | Charles M. Schulz (a) & Nomi Kane (d) | 2 |

ComicInfo.Characters: Linus van Pelt,Marcie,Peppermint Patty,Charlie Brown,Lucy van Pelt
